channel.title: Emile Hirsch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Emile Hirsch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: See Emile Hirsch in Horror-Comedy ‘Lice’ (Exclusive First Look)
item.description: When a mysterious parasite starts infecting high school students, burnt out science teacher Mr. Shanker (Hirsch) takes matters into his own hands.
